website_summaries.verdict: Easy cleanup, low odor and natural leak resistance make this one the best bin on the market.
pros: Leak free, rust free and charcoal filters keep odors down
cons: Uses two filter, but at least they're cheap
Ceramic is environmentally friendly, but also heavier than competing, metal and plastic units

customer_reviews.title: Save the Planet!
customer_reviews.text: I recently signed up for a new composting service in my community. I purchased two of these countertop composters, one for home and one for work, so that I don't have to continually go out to my garage to the large compost pail. These are unobtrusive (actually kind of cute) and there is NO smell. I also purchased compostable bags so I don't have to clean these out. A couple of times a week, I simply remove the bags and place them in my large composter. They have a small footprint, but hold a lot. GREAT purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little kitchen compost bucket!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and functionality of this little kitchen compost bucket. The outside is a sturdy crock. The inside bucket has worn well and is easy to clean. I fill it nearly every day and did find the filters to be a hassle, always slipping out, but odor is not an issue for me, so I tossed them. Still a five star product in my opinion. The lid fits fine and is so cute! Love the little sprout. I forget to put it under the sink and it looks fine next to the coffee. I considered a few cheaper versions but glad I spent a few extra dollars for this one.
customer_reviews.author: Lopy

customer_reviews.title: Great countertop compost bin!
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-constructed, nice-to-look-at compost bin for your countertop. The top has a replaceable filter underneath that keeps odors at bay, and a nice, leaf handle for lifting. Inside is a green pale with a stainless handle. Just lift and carry out to to your compost. Rinse, repeat! The outer crock only requires a rinse once in a while or a wipe down. It's a tad small for a family of five, especially if we've had water melon or corn, but most days its perfect. SO much better than the stinky, plastic one we had under the sink for years. We got dogs, and that had to change!
customer_reviews.author: William Reidy

customer_reviews.title: Looks fantastic! Functions perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This countertop compost container not only looks super cool, it's designed well. The substantial ceramic outer bin is smooth and easy to keep clean. The inner bucket easily slips out for it's trip to the big compost bin. The lid fits perfectly. I'm so happy with this compost bin. It's expensive, but it's well made, pretty, and doesn't look like a garbage can. I struggled with rationalizing the cost. My granddaughter came into the kitchen yesterday and said "nice compost bin, Grandma!" I asked her how she knew it was a compost bin and she pointed to the little sprout. It announces it's purpose in a subtle, fun way.
customer_reviews.author: jjoan

customer_reviews.title: Cute but ants came immediately!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was so cute but as soon as I put it on my countertop and added some scraps like orange peels - ants started swarming. In the wintertime! I noticed the lid does not fit on tightly. I have been researching compost bins and it is very unclear if lids should be airtight. Some are and I will try that next. It is also unclear if compostable bags are recommended but it seems counter-intuitive to need those as well when you empty a washable bin regularly.
customer_reviews.author: D. Alison Watt

customer_reviews.title: Great design.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a scrap bin In my kitchen for convenience, but didn’t want it to look like I had a bucket of garbage sitting on the counter. This disguises it’s purpose brilliantly. The outer crock is a nice ceramic. The green liner is lightweight without being flimsy and has a convenient handle. The liner is a great addition making it so much easier to transfer the “goods” to an outdoor compost bin. The lid has an easily replaceable charcoal liner to help keep any orders inside while still letting air in. I’ve filled it a couple times now and haven’t noticed any smells at all.
customer_reviews.author: Heather F

customer_reviews.title: just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I had hoped for...It's easy to fill: I can easily lift the lid with one hand while the other hand is full of scraps. The lid is loose enough to lift easily, yet covers the container well. It looks great on the counter. It cleans easily. I like that I don't have to take the whole container to the larger compost bin, I just carry the pail, rinse it out, dry it with a paper towel which I leave to cover the bottom for the next fill, preventing the next scraps from sticking to the bottom. I need to empty it twice weekly for a family of three adults.
customer_reviews.author: kateslibrary

customer_reviews.title: This has to be the cutest compost bin ever....
customer_reviews.text: However, it is a little small. The compostable bags I use to line it are the small size but they are way too big for this bin, so it is a bit wasteful that way, We are just two people and we have to empty it almost daily. We do eat a lot of veggies, avocados and eggs, so that adds up. I am sad about it being small since it looks so nice on the counter -- something most other compost bins do not. I am going to buy a bigger option and hid it under the sink. But I will keep this one and use it exclusively to collect napkins and paper towels, which my composter takes.
customer_reviews.author: N. Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and Tidy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great countertop compost container. It's attractive, and keeps the odors in order. I use this daily and dump the full container into a larger container that get's picked up once a week in our town. We'll get bags of compost without the total work. Our trash has decreased in size. When we usually would have two or three bags of trash per week, we have one now. Pretty amazing at what we've been wasting. ugh...
customer_reviews.author: Susie D.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra cash!!!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! And so discreet! We have had this for about three months now and have yet to change out the filter. I love how the green plastic insert can be cleaned out each time we dump out the compost. We empty this bin about once every four days and have absolutely no problem with fruit flies or other nasty creatures. We always get compliments on it. While this bin is a bit pricier than some of the other bins on Amazon, it is definitely worth the cute smell, discreet appearance, and high quality. I would absolutely recommend this bin!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Ceramic Food Container
customer_reviews.text: We love this 3 pc container. It is extremely easy to clean both the container that receives the compost food material, and the outer ceramic container. The handle on the plastic tub inside makes for very easy access to take out to dump. The filter system in the lid works extremely well, and doesn't need to be changed often. A win, win situation.
customer_reviews.author: connie turner

customer_reviews.title: No Complaints!
customer_reviews.text: Nice look and competent little compost holder. Holds enough for 2 to 4 vegetarian cooking sessions. Works well with compostable bags bought through Amazon. I like how I can hide the extra bag material between the plastic insert and the porcelain exterior.
customer_reviews.author: Peter N

customer_reviews.title: Worthless. Just use a mason jar. The carbon ...
customer_reviews.text: Worthless. Just use a mason jar. The carbon filter does absolutely nothing to combat smell, it might as well be a cotton swab. As a result fruit flies and maggots move in IMMEDIATELY. We had many maggots writhing around inside and a gust of fruitflies coming out of the lid every time it was moved after only 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Best kitchen mulch pot we ever had. Our old ceramic pot was heavy and hard to clean. This design with the inner plastic pail is awesome. It is easy to carry to the garden and to clean afterwards. The outside ceramic always stays tidy and the leaf on the lid is just plain cute. It looks great on out on our counter.
customer_reviews.author: Dmac

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and practical.
customer_reviews.text: I love this counter top compost storage. The inner bucket is a great idea and makes emptying into our larger outdoor compost a lot easier. I am not worried about cracking the ceramic outer container. So far there is no smell, even with stinky onions and garlic. I would recommend this to anybody that wants a nice container to be on the countertop.
customer_reviews.author: Jen and John Philipson

customer_reviews.title: lid is not tight= fruit flies
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was so dang cute. It had the carbon lid insert so for that I thought it would keep fruit flies away. I was so wrong. The lid is not tight on it and fruit flies can get in and out. Not only that but they laid eggs in the carbon filter of the lid.... so grossed out. I don't recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: S. Tilford

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Functional!
customer_reviews.text: I am fairly new to composting, and I was looking for something to keep my scraps in before taking them outside that wouldn't stink up my kitchen. This bin is absolutely perfect! I don't smell any rotting food ever, even when it's full. It is heavy and sturdy without taking up a lot of counter space. It's really cute, and I love that you can take just the inside bucket out. Super useful, practical and adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: An excellent tool to help with your composting
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool to help you maximize your composting. It has a small footprint and looks great on a kitchen counter. The charcoal filter does a great job of stopping smells from escaping and the removable bin inside is lightweight and easy to clean and carry to your compost tumbler or pile. Makes reducing waste super easy.
customer_reviews.author: B4E1

customer_reviews.title: No smell detected,  easy to clean, pretty ceramic design.
customer_reviews.text: No scent detectable. Easy to clean. Pretty to look at. Putting scraps of food in the composter keeps my regular garbage can from stinking, so I can take out the garbage less often. My one complaint is when I remove the compostable "plastic" liner it can catch on the handle of the inside bucket. Other than that it's a great little counter composter.
customer_reviews.author: Chad & Melynda

customer_reviews.title: hefty product
customer_reviews.text: This is not a cheap plastic bucket. Outside shell is heavy porcelain with a plastic bucket on the inside. I like the finish and size which lets us store organic waste for about 4 days (household of 2). Anything bigger would take up too much space on my counter top. The only thing I wished it had is some kind of rubber or silicone on the bottom in order to protect the counter-top from scratches.
customer_reviews.author: William T.

customer_reviews.title: Fruit fly maker.
customer_reviews.text: AWFUL. If I could give zero stars I would. This is basically a fruit fly maker. The design allows critters & flies inside. Super bummed because it’s so cute but honestly not worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and functions well!
customer_reviews.text: Great size for the countertop... the top (with filter) keeps the bugs out and the smell in. We empty ours daily into our compost bin outside. The plastic pail insert is really easy to rinse out/clean. The ceramic base is also easy to clean. It comes with two filters; after a month of use, we haven’t felt that the filter needed changing.
customer_reviews.author: Distant Planet

customer_reviews.title: If only the lid fit it would be 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about this item and it would have worked perfectly IF the lid fit. The handy green bucket insert does not fit snugly into the ceramic outer vessel, and that prevents the lid from seating properly. I think that's an invitation to fruit flies. If they could resolve the lid fit issue, I would give the item five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Stock

customer_reviews.title: Great product -- facilitates composting!
customer_reviews.text: I have this on my counter for collecting compostable scraps. Then when it is full, every few days, I take it out to the composter. Very convenient to have this in the kitchen right where the scraps are created. Highly recommended. Nice size, but for me, it could be a little bigger. It's stylish too, so its purpose is disguised from all but the nosiest guests.
customer_reviews.author: Jimono

customer_reviews.title: Cute compost bin
customer_reviews.text: We use the compost bin constantly so I wanted something I could keep on the countertop. This is a cute little bin, nice size. The plastic piece that holds the charcoal filter in place (attaches to lid) cracked so there's nothing in place to hold the filter, which is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome counter compost bin
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking compost bin for my counter top. I love that there is a pail inside that can be removed easily. I use the ecoliner bags to keep it clean and dump it once every day or two days. I do wish it were bigger so it could hold more waste, but I think that's more of an issue with me being lazy than anything! I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ToddlerMama

customer_reviews.title: NO. SMELL.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent at containing the smell of scraps before they're taken out to the bin. Ceramic exterior is solid and heavy - no risk of it tipping over. Interior plastic container is not flimsy at all and is easy to remove and clean. We just started composting and this container has been a very helpful addition to our routine.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Compost Bin
customer_reviews.text: This looks great on the counter or in the sink. We have a two-compartment sink and keep this in one of them in order to keep the counter clear. The size is perfect to use for a few days before emptying. The filter does its job as there is no smell from the container when the filter is in place. We replace it every six months or so. I appreciate it's clean looking design. I'd buy again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: declutterbug

customer_reviews.title: Fruit fly maker!
customer_reviews.text: Fruit flies! There were so many good reviews on this and I wanted to love it so much. But every time I open this there are swarms of guilt flies that comes out! I don’t want to have to empty it everyday (that kind of defeats the purpose of having something in the house) and I don’t want the house smelling like apple cider vinegar to get rid of them. If I could, I would return this since it so I could try something else. Cute construction though.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Really super cute. Kind of big for one person
customer_reviews.text: This compost bin is the cutest I’ve seen. It is also very sturdy. I wish it came in a smaller size because It is way too big for one person. I returned it and am using a mason jar for now.
customer_reviews.author: AMW

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Compared to others we've had, this is a good one. The ceramic outer bucket looks nice and stays put. The inner bucket is lightweight and easy to carry and clean. The filters work well and a couple are included, which is handy. The lid is a tad tricky, that's why I gave 4 instead of 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. D

customer_reviews.title: The cutest countertop foodscrap buddy!
customer_reviews.text: It’s the perfect little countertop scrap bin. I like how cute it looks on my counter. I also like the easily removable plastic bucket inside - easy to carry my scraps out to the woods. Overall I think it’s a great size to sit on the counter without looking too big, yet large enough to collect food scraps from the week. And much more convenient than an under the counter/under the sink alternative.
customer_reviews.author: RubiRocket

customer_reviews.title: Modern and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy to have found a unique and modern compost bin. I really did not want something that looked like a trash can sitting on my counter. This container is beautifully designed. As for functionality, the removable interior is great and easy to clean. I have yet to smell anything coming from the bin, even having left food in it for days. I was also concerned about fruit flies, but I have yet to have any issues. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: JoFaraday

customer_reviews.title: Fruit flies get in - doesn't seal
customer_reviews.text: It looks great and is easy to pull out and bring to my compost, but unfortunately as many other reviews pointed out it is a breeding ground for fruit flies. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Mod for liner use = perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and perfect for kitchen compost collection. The only thing is I put tape over the wire of the handles inside as my compostable bags I use as liners kept catching. However, it's now perfect and you don't need to use the liners.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Filter does an ok job
customer_reviews.text: This thing holds the smell in for the most part. We had some pretty stinky collections lately, and most was contained inside the container. We use this and dump into outside larger composter.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Hochstedler

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, no smell
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this countertop compost bin. It's nice looking, there's no smell, easy to empty and clean. Seriously, no smell. The inside little bucket is a great design so that the outer bucket is heavy and doesn't get scooted around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, and great odor control! It looks so cute on my kitchen counter. I absolutely love it and get tons of comments when friends come over!
customer_reviews.author: LovleyLacey

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and works well
customer_reviews.text: I love this little compost bin. Haven't noticed any smell, and I've had it for about a year. I got some compostable bags to place inside it. Easy to clean the plastic bin if the compostable bags ever leak. It looks so good on the countertop also. Would strongly recommend to anyone who composts or is looking to compost.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Boucher

customer_reviews.title: Great for kitchen scraps
customer_reviews.text: White ceramic easy to clean and looks nicer than most kitchen compost bins; inside bucket also easy to clean with or without compost bags; lid surprisingly functional and keeps smell down; great item
customer_reviews.author: Sandycc

customer_reviews.title: Very nice clean bin
customer_reviews.text: This bin is slick. Love the ceramic which looks clean on the counter with a nice black top and the cute green leave handle. Much nicer than other compost bins I've seen. I use it with compostable bags, which when placed properly around the inner plastic bin, don't show outside. It's also easy to clean the plastic inner bin. My only complaint is that sometimes the bag will tear on removal on the side hinges it has. But that can be avoided by not overloading the bin and removing slowly.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian Beca

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: Cute on the counter. No one knows the potential of ick inside. I dump mine every other day so it doesn’t get stinky. But glad the filter is there just in case. Comes with two filters, too.
customer_reviews.author: K in Idaho

customer_reviews.title: Love this cute little container!
customer_reviews.text: I previously had a metal container than rusted over time, was difficult to clean and manage, and tended to have an odor. The EcoCrock has a great design, seals perfectly, and is the perfect size for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: cwhite449

customer_reviews.title: My favorite counter compost collector
customer_reviews.text: My favorite counter compost collector! Not only is it super cute but, unlike many other counter top compost collectors, the material never chips or corrodes. So tired of "ceramic" and metal containers that corrode and rust within weeks. This sucker will last you YEARS. It pairs really nicely with BioBags and is super cute to look at.
customer_reviews.author: DrowsyKitten

customer_reviews.title: Better than I imagined
customer_reviews.text: Quality ceramic container with a light weight, but high-quality plastic interior that I can easily lift out, empty, and rinse. Top fits snuggly and no smells. Absolutely beautiful (and discrete!) addition to my countertop in the corner by the sink. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: G Jones

customer_reviews.title: but for a short time was storing our scraps in ziplock bags which was a waste. The other designs for compost bins I saw ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom because we recently started using our compost bin in the backyard again this year, but for a short time was storing our scraps in ziplock bags which was a waste. The other designs for compost bins I saw online looked either like trashcans or fire hydrants. This design is sleek and simple and I love the little leaf handle. The size is perfect because it keeps enough scraps for a few days as we wouldn't want to leave it any longer anyways. Also I don't remember seeing any other bins that had filters so that was a very nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: claire

customer_reviews.title: Great Bargain
customer_reviews.text: Well made thick porcelain container with easy remove insert bucket with handle. Looks good and neat on a counter and is good size. Had for a few weeks and never noticed any smells.
customer_reviews.author: Mat N

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this!
customer_reviews.text: The little leaves on top are so cute and the whole thing is a really nice quality. The ceramic bottom keeps the inside a moderate temperature and it's sturdy enough that I'm not worried about accidentally knocking it over. The pail inside is a really nice quality and is really easily removed to dump the contents. The top also fits very snugly and I can't smell anything through the filter, even if it's been sitting for a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Looks cute and keeps scraps smell free for 2-3 days at a time
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Haven't had any gnat problems. Keeps smell to a minimum. Use it to hold scraps for 2-3 days before it fills up and I dump it into our community compost bucket. Also looks pretty cute on the counter. Have had several hot humid days and while the contents got a bit slimy, we couldn't smell the contents at all.
customer_reviews.author: linguistchick

customer_reviews.title: Cuter than I even expected
customer_reviews.text: We just invested in a JoraForm compost tumbler which I HIGHLY recommend. We already love it. In the kitchen, I was using a stainless steel container but it wasn't large enough to hold one day's worth of kitchen scraps and coffee grounds. So after a lot of research and review reading, I ordered this Chef"n EcoCrock. It is so adorable. I leave it on the counter. People think it's a cookie jar. It holds an entire day's worth of kitchen scraps. I empty it every day and rinse out the inner bucket and it never has a smell -- even after I clean out the fridge. I am extremely happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: GardenBugGal33

customer_reviews.title: Still pleased with it after a year!
customer_reviews.text: We've had ours for a year so far and still love it! It's been durable, easy to use, attractive, and just the right size for two people. I was surprised that the inner plastic liner does not seem to retain smells and is easy to clean. If you're looking for something functional and stylish for your counter, this is a great option.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Cain

customer_reviews.title: Great, but check it immediately for cracks
customer_reviews.text: I love this compost holder. It's really attractive and easy to use. My only complaint is that the porcelain outer shell was cracked on arrival, but I didn't notice until it was too late to do anything about it. Perhaps the shipper needs to improve packaging so that they don't crack in shipment.
customer_reviews.author: A. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this bin. It's a decent size, so I don't have to empty it several times a day, but not so big that it's visually overpowering on my counter. The ceramic crock is a nice quality and doesn't look like a cheap plastic garbage container sitting on my counter. It's heavy enough that it doesn't get knocked over or pushed around, but the plastic liner is light and makes it easy to take the compost out. It's also easy to clean. No odor problems so far, but I typically take the scraps out after I cook and rarely leave it more than a few hours if I don't.
customer_reviews.author: Frieda

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The humble compost pail has evolved! This is the 4th pail we've had in the last 16 years, and by far the best. LOVE having the removable plastic pail inside the crockery - it makes trips to the compost pile much easier. It looks nice on the counter, the lid fits snugly, no odors, no fruit flies.
customer_reviews.author: DCL

customer_reviews.title: SO CUTE AND WORKS GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous compost holder! First - it is so cute on the counter and the whole family is actually using it! Also the inner basket is a good size to gather the scraps from 1-2 days. It is easy to pour into the compost tumbler and keep clean. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size is good for a two person family.
customer_reviews.text: So far I like the counter compost bin. I collect for about a week to week and a half. I do chop up the contents before dumping in so I can get the materials into the container compactly. There are no bad smells because of the filter. I would have like it better if the container was a little larger.
customer_reviews.author: L,  Asato

customer_reviews.title: No smell!
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is the interior handle. But, that's because We line our bin with a compostable bag. If you don't, then no problem. Filter works well. No odor. Nice size. Cute.
customer_reviews.author: Czarina Bam

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: We use this just about every day, the plastic pale with handle inside is so handy, beats lugging the whole thing out to the yard. It's easy to clean up unless you wait too long to empty it (done that). We have thrown it in the dishwasher for a good cleaning. The filter works great to keep down the odor even when we do get lazy.
customer_reviews.author: Emptysack

customer_reviews.title: Practical and cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one to replace a couple year old cute metal one that started breaking and rusting. Wanted one that looks nice since it lives on the counter, but also functional and practical. Been using this one for a couple months and so far it works great and seems like it will last for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, no smell
customer_reviews.text: This looks very nice on the counter, easy to remove the inner pail to empty.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: cute composter
customer_reviews.text: no smell, no bugs, no problems. i bought it because it is a little smaller than most countertop compost bins, which is what I wanted. it generally just needs a quick rinse, but if it does need a deeper clean all the parts fit into the dishwasher. filter is easy to change and i have had no problem ordering them on amazon.com. i also like that there is an interior plastic pail, which is lightweight and has a handle so it is easy to carry. i love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive countertop compost bin
customer_reviews.text: I only received this today, but am very pleased with how nice it looks (from the kitchen window appearing like a tall white pot with a small plant growing out of the top!) I am also very glad that it has the removable plastic container inside which can be removed and emptied into the larger garden/compost bin outside, and then easily washed. The top which has a filter set in it, with an extra one included in the package, fits well. We will enjoy using this vs. our old plastic container, and hopefully will be free of fruit flies.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer. crumpy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect compost bin
customer_reviews.text: Super stocked about this! We've had it for 2 months and love it so much! Easy to clean, doesn't attract any fruit flies, holds a lot and is cute!
customer_reviews.author: Lexy Davis

customer_reviews.title: nice compost bin
customer_reviews.text: Great little compost bin. We looked at a few different ones, but chose this one because the plastic bin inside comes out to take the junk to the compost barrel outside. It is also very heavy ceramic and that helps from easily knocking it over on the counter like our old plastic one. The filter seems to do its job too. I haven't smelled any nastiness coming out yet. Cleans easy too. I can't think of anything that is negative. maybe if it was a little bigger, but then I would probably leave stuff in it too long rather than taking it out in a timely manner!
customer_reviews.author: rgt

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to the counter top
customer_reviews.text: It’s my new compost container - much more attractive than the bucket I was using. People have actually commented on its looks
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M. Ducharme

customer_reviews.title: Works on the floor too!
customer_reviews.text: This is advertised as a counter compost bin, and it's attractive enough to be on the counter, but my counter space is limited so it's on the floor. There is no odor coming from it. It's fruit fly attractiveness will tell once the weather gets warmer. I like it, and use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: JodyB

customer_reviews.title: Form and Function
customer_reviews.text: This compost bin design makes sense. I love the removable bucket with the handle. The lid fits well; it's not so tight that it's hard to pull off, but it fits snugly enough to not worry about rotting food smells seeping through. It is easy to clean, easy to use, and looks good on the counter. There was a crack in the ceramic white outer bucket when it arrived, but we chose to keep it because the crack was fairly small and we didn't want to wait. I am watching it to make sure the white ceramic doesn't crack any further.
customer_reviews.author: D. Vidmar

customer_reviews.title: Has held up for years
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for a couple of years and it looks as new as the day that I got it. It cleans up well. I would buy it again and highly recommend it. Looks very high quality on the countertop. Update: Still going strong after 4 years - no discoloration, the ceramic exterior is high quality, cleans up nicely, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: great crock
customer_reviews.text: easy to clean, looks nice in kitchen. I really like the convenient carry bucket - hubby can go dump that mess and I can wash the outside crock, then wash the interior bucket, ready to refill. We use this for daily coffee grounds, vegetable and fruit cuttings, gets dumped frequently into hubby's garden compost pile in the back yard. We have a very productive garden and I'm sure this stuff helps!
customer_reviews.author: June Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and Practical
customer_reviews.text: Great looking compost container for your counter top. It is easy to clean and looks sleek enough and certainly hides what’s in it very well. Very practical and yet aesthetically pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: Sabine S. Holub

customer_reviews.title: Overall, works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great at reducing fruit flies. Just the right size for us. Takes between 5-7 days for us to fill it up and it doesn't stink. Attractive on our counter and very easy to clean. Minus one star just because the filter has a tendency to fall off when lifting the lid. However it is easy to push back into place. There has to be a simple design solution that would give it just enough of a lip to help hold it in place better.
customer_reviews.author: MTK

customer_reviews.title: It's a heavy white ceramic base !!!
customer_reviews.text: for some reason, I was thinking it was going to be all plastic & lightweight... I might have missed it in the write up, but it's a heavy ceramic base with the plastic insert bucket and plastic top. Super cute & great quality :)
customer_reviews.author: alsdkr

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and functional
customer_reviews.text: Received this a couple weeks ago. Began using it right away. It’s perfect for storing pre compost kitchen waste for 2-3 days. It’s so cute on the counter. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette

customer_reviews.title: Awesome compost bin!!
customer_reviews.text: I ♥️ this compost bin!! We used a little bucket for years, it was smelly and annoying (no one wanted to take it outside) so I wanted a real compost bin. It not only doesn't smell but it's cute and it fits perfectly in the little spot available next to the sink. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got fruit flies. Had to buy traps to rid ...
customer_reviews.text: Got fruit flies. Had to buy traps to rid them from my kitchen. I read that ceramic encourages them. I bought a stainless steel one and have had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: AMY

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this compost container! It’s a great size easy to empty and clean and is attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Dani F.

customer_reviews.title: cute design, doesn't seal completely to prevent bugs from festering
customer_reviews.text: I like that its visually appealing on the counter top but on the contrary it doesn't seal completely so fruit flies are able to come in and out as they please, drives me nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for the countertop
customer_reviews.text: I’m really glad I chose this ceramic compost bin over one that looks like a trash can. It looks great on my counter, fits in the corner nicely and holds about one week’s worth of cooking scraps. It doesn’t smell at all, and the inner bin is easy to remove and clean as well. Pro tip: place a biodegradable coffee filter in the bottom for easy emptying of the bin.
customer_reviews.author: nat_the_cat

customer_reviews.title: Didn't protect against bugs
customer_reviews.text: Have issue with bugs in container. can't store contents for long in kitchen before taking it out to composter. It dosen't seem to smell bad but that maybe because I can't leave things in there for long. The container is cute and the biodegradable bags seem to work well in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice and cleans up well (as opposed to some of the stainless steel versions we've tried), but the lid just sits on the top of the bucket, so if you're close to full, the lid doesn't fit snugly and bugs can get in. We had the Good Ideas PAIL-BOO Bamboo Compost Pail before, and if I had it to do over again, I'd have gotten that one again. (It lasted three years before cracking, and had a much better seal on the lid.)
customer_reviews.author: LizPo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.text: This compost pot is perfect. We empty it every couple of days and I never have a problem with smells or fruit flies. It looks cute on the counter. The inside bucket is perfect for taking out the compost, and can go in the dishwasher to get cleaned. The lid fits great, and I really like the filter that helps with potential smells. Not too big, or too small - just the right size. ***UPDATE*** four years later this awesome crock is still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: MV

customer_reviews.title: Great compost bin
customer_reviews.text: Elegant yet useful. One of my best purchases in years. No flies, no odor, just a beautiful counter piece.
customer_reviews.author: billyboy

customer_reviews.title: Baby groot
customer_reviews.text: This thing looks adorable in my counter. Very sturdy and well made. Very good at controlling smells.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra L.

customer_reviews.title: Best countertop compost container on the market
customer_reviews.text: The genius and simplicity of the design makes EcoCrock easy and convenient to use. The removeable seamless liner eliminates the need for those one-size-fits-none compost bags. The smooth seamless interior of the liner means that the contents empty completely and rinses easily. It's slender oval design looks much better on the countertop than most other containers. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: i like the look
customer_reviews.text: it arrived very quickly with no issues, and was extremely well boxed. i like the look, the ceramic, and the functionality of this product. only 3 stars because i didn't realize the lid, and the little green sprig, were made of plastic, and this was truly disappointing. they seem pretty flimsly and i'm not sure how long they'll last, and i just don't care for plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Chandrama

customer_reviews.title: Easy-peasy and good-looking, too
customer_reviews.text: This bin is nice-looking and, unlike most, doesn't occupy much real estate on my counter. The heavy white ceramic outer pot doesn't tip over, and the inner green plastic bucket can easily be moved close to your work space, as well as to be emptied. As some of have said, the bin itself is a little small but it's plenty large enough for two adults consuming lots of garden greens and veggies. And while the lid seemed a little fiddly at first, that stopped once I got the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Nash

customer_reviews.title: My daughter likes and uses this counter composterr.
customer_reviews.text: I like that my daughter nolinger keeps just a plastic bad with compostibles I her kitchen oh yer!
customer_reviews.author: J G Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great Fruit Fly Incubator
customer_reviews.text: Shoddy design creates ideal fruit fly breeding grounds! Love the early composting technique of seeing maggots in the kitchen. Tried to block top holes with coffee filter and tape, but flies find access via holes in green bucket handle and/or rim. Should be pulled off market until this issue addressed!
customer_reviews.author: jen cash

customer_reviews.title: and the lid keeps the smells inside beautifully. There IS sometimes a bit of a smellspolsion ...
customer_reviews.text: It's big enough to hold plenty of scraps, and the lid keeps the smells inside beautifully. There IS sometimes a bit of a smellspolsion when the lid is lifted off, but over all, its much better than any alternative I've found. I like that it's heavy enough the cats can't knock it over, but that the lighter interior pail can be taken out for transport to the compost heap.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: The product looks good but we’ve had quite the issues with it. We’re regular on emptying the bin but it has brought so many fruit flies to our kitchen. The filter doesn’t help block the flies or scent. If you don’t mind that, this product is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Carter Howrll

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Unit is as pictured. Purchased compost able bags for it to make emptying easier. Heavy ceramic shell and durable plastic liner. Carbon filter seems to be doing a good job and it comes with a spare.
customer_reviews.author: Irish Pig

customer_reviews.title: Compact and attractive
customer_reviews.text: It seems to work fine and my guilt about throwing food scraps in the garbage has been reduced.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Stein

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Looks nice on counter. Easy to remove inside bucket which rinses right out.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Practical
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful addition to my counter. Easy addition of vegetable scraps to my compost pile!
customer_reviews.author: Chef Ru

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing! Never thought I would use it...
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing, never thought we would use it until we got it! Use it together with the compost out in the back yard, it's environmentally friend and it is clean and easy to use, no odour at all! Just rinse with water after each dump. We collect wilted flowers, food scraps, coffee grounds, fruit peels and pits, otherwise ended up in the trash bags...there are endless things can go in the EcoCrock counter compost bin!
customer_reviews.author: Ilovebeads

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, Clean & the Right Size
customer_reviews.text: This composting bin is great for an NYC apartment, as it's the right size for a small space (with no outdoors) and it provides sufficient coverage to avoid any bad smells from spreading through the apartment. The handle is very cute and it goes well with the kitchen look.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is great. I've had it for a few months and haven't had any smells at all. Modest size is right at home on my countertop. I was pretty nervous when I bought this thing because I had never has a compost bin indoors but this thing is great. Maybe it helps that my wife empties it every couple of days...
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking design
customer_reviews.text: Cool looking design. Bucket with handle is easy to port to the compost site. It holds the right amount to store before you need to take it outside. The egg shape of the container takes up a lot of counter space. This is the tradeoff for aesthetics.
customer_reviews.author: Plummy

customer_reviews.title: Simple, cute, functional compost bin
customer_reviews.text: Love the plain design with the cute little sprout handle on top. The green plastic bucket inside is easy to remove, lightweight to carry, and simple to clean. No odor, and it comes with a replacement charcoal filter.
customer_reviews.author: susan k

customer_reviews.title: totally loving it!
customer_reviews.text: finally got a compost pail that holds up to my needs! Easy to clean and looks great, even on my counter top!
customer_reviews.author: Denah

product_meta.title: Chef'n 401-420-120 EcoCrock Counter Compost Bin
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Standard PackagingComposting is simple and easy with the Chef'n EcoCrock Counter Compost Bin. This contemporary countertop compost bin allows you collect up to 3-quarts of food scraps right in your kitchen. It's a creative composting solution for urban use or anywhere an outdoor composting bin is not an option. The EcoCrock is a 3.3-liter (.75-gallon) modern ceramic countertop composter that features a vented lid with a charcoal filter that absorbs odors, keeping your kitchen smelling fresh. A drafted bucket shape allows food scraps to slide out without a mess or hassle. If preferable, a plastic bag can be placed inside the bucket as a liner. Clean up takes just few seconds, simply rinse bucket with warm water, and dry. 2 disposable natural charcoal filters ship with this green friendly bin. Choose smart, easy-to-use kitchen utensils that are built on tasteful design, new technologies, and the trusted reputation of Chef'n.
feature_bullets: CONTEMPORARY DESIGN: Modern 3 liter (0.75 gallon) ceramic countertop compost bin, featuring a vented lid, removable inner bucket, and a replaceable natural charcoal filter that traps and absorbs odors.
AT HOME: Dual bucket design with removable inner bucket and built in handle allows food scraps to easily slide out without a mess or hassle.
ODOR FREE: Includes two replaceable natural charcoal filters that trap and absorb food odors, leaving your kitchen fresh and clean.
TIDY KITCHEN: Tapered bucket allows easy clean up that only takes a few seconds. Great for shaved brussel sprouts, banana peels, broccoli scrapes, apple cores and other compostable delights.
EASY TO CLEAN: Inner bucket is Top-Rack dishwasher safe. Rinse outer ceramic with hot water and wipe clean.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
